$successPage.afterSalesEmail: Our after-sales department is at your disposal at the following address:
$successPage.bankTransfer_1: You have chosen to pay by bank transfer.
$successPage.bankTransfer_2: To validate your order and allow us to start the delivery process, we kindly ask you to organise the bank transfer within 5 working days.
$successPage.bankTransfer_3: An online transfer can be carried out very easily:
$successPage.bankTransfer_4: In your online bank account, enter the bank details of {siteName}  (Managed by HOTELS AT HOME SAS), the transfer amount and the order number.
$successPage.bankTransfer_5: Please note that your order will be reserved for 5 working days. If we do not receive your payment within 5 working days, your order will be automatically cancelled.
$successPage.bankTransfer_6: Once your payment has been received and your order has been validated, we will send a confirmation email to the address
$successPage.bankTransfer_7: Please note that Hotels At Home SAS will not be liable for any bank fees arising as a result of the payment.
$successPage.canceled_2: If you have a customer account, you can find your order in the "Orders" section of your account.
$successPage.check_1: You have chosen to pay by cheque.
$successPage.check_2: To validate your order and allow us to start the delivery process, we kindly ask you to organise the cheque within 5 working days.
$successPage.check_3: 1. Please send us a cheque dated the same as the order date, made out to HOTELS AT HOME in the amount of {amount}
$successPage.check_4: 2. Please write your order number {orderId} on the back of your cheque
$successPage.check_5: 3. You must submit a copy of both sides of your personal ID card/passport with your payment. Please address your payment to:
$successPage.creditCard: Please kindly note that the recipient for your payment is the company HOTELS AT HOME.
$successPage.customerServiceEmail: Our customer service department is at your disposal at the following address: {email}
$successPage.declined_1: A technical problem occurred during your authorization / payment request.
$successPage.declined_2: Please contact our customer service at {tel} or by email at the following address: {email}
$successPage.onlineSuccessTips: A confirmation email with your order details has just been sent to you at the following address: {email}
$successPage.successTips: A confirmation email with all payment details has just been sent to you at the following address: {email}
$successPage.thankYouAgain: Thank you and see you again soon on {siteName} !
$successPage.thankYouForPurchase: Thank you for your purchase on {siteName}
$successPage.uncertain_1: A technical problem occurred during your authorization / payment request.

$common.contactUsDisclaimer: In application of the French law of 6 January 1978 relative to information technology, computer files and freedom, you have the right to access, to modify and to delete your personal information. All requests and claims should be addressed to: {siteName} /HOTELSATHOME - 163 rue de la Belle Etoile - Business Park Paris Nord 2 – Bât 6B - 95700 ROISSY EN FRANCE - France.
$common.contactusTips:
{siteName} welcomes all questions, suggestions and comments regarding our products, our site and our services.
Please kindly use the following form and select the subject that corresponds to your requests. A Concierge Service Representative will respond within 24 hours.
If you would prefer to speak with a Concierge Service Representative, you may call +33 1 41 51 54 21 or chat live Monday - Friday 8 AM to 7 PM CET.
$common.cookieText: By continuing your visit on this site, you accept the use of cookies to propose you customized services and adapted offers.
$common.cookielink: For more information and to set up your cookies.
$common.disclaimer: By registering your email address, you agree to receive the marketing news of {siteName} by email. You can unsubscribe at any time via the links in each of our emails.
$common.readAndAgree: Please read and agree with the Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy of {siteName}
$common.registerTips: By creating an account with our store, you will be able to move through the checkout process faster, store multiple shipping addresses, view and track your orders in your account and more.

$hpCopy.bathBodyText: Luxurious bath essentials from The Spa at Mandarin Oriental.
$hpCopy.bathSlideText_bathBody: Relax the mind and nourish the body with our spa collection of cleansers, moisturisers and oils.
$hpCopy.bathSlideText_bathrobe: Envelop yourself in comfort with our luxuriously soft bathrobes.
$hpCopy.bathSlideText_fragrance: Fill your home with soothing aromas inspired by the five elements central to our Oriental roots.
$hpCopy.bathSlideText_towels: Enhance your bathing ritual with our plush and absorbent towels.
$hpCopy.beddingText: Discover exceptional comfort with our expertly crafted bedding and elegant linens.
$hpCopy.exclusivesSlideHeading_bucket: Classic Hong Kong Ice Bucket from Mandarin Oriental, Hong Kong
$hpCopy.exclusivesSlideHeading_cookbook: Signed Cookbooks from Mandarin Oriental, London, Madrid and Miami
$hpCopy.exclusivesSlideHeading_fan: Fan by Vivienne Tam from Mandarin Oriental, Guangzhou
$hpCopy.exclusivesSlideHeading_scarf: Scarf by Jim Thompson from Mandarin Oriental, Bangkok
$hpCopy.exclusivesSlideHeading_towels: Moroccan Tassel Towels from Mandarin Oriental, Marrakech
$hpCopy.exclusivesSlideText_bucket: Inspired by ancient vessels, our classic Hong Kong ice bucket makes for an arresting bar accessory.
$hpCopy.exclusivesSlideText_cookbook: Discover a new recipe from our locally inspired autographed cookbooks to try in your own kitchen.
$hpCopy.exclusivesSlideText_fan: Cool off in style with a chic fan featuring Mandarin Oriental, Guangzhou's exclusive motif.
$hpCopy.exclusivesSlideText_scarf: Add a touch of intrigue to any outfit with a hand-embroidered silk scarf designed by Jim Thompson.
$hpCopy.exclusivesSlideText_towels: Bring a spirited flair to your bathing ritual with our soft and absorbent Moroccan tassel towels.
$hpCopy.exclusivesSlideText_yukatas: Make a striking addition to your loungewear ensemble with a traditional Japanese yukata.
$hpCopy.exclusivesText: Distinctive treasures from a selection of our most popular hotels.
$hpCopy.fragranceText: Fill your home with soothing aromas inspired by the five elements central to our Oriental roots.
$hpCopy.giftCardHeading: Give The Gift of Mandarin Oriental
$hpCopy.giftCardText: Delight your friends and loved ones with the gift of Mandarin Oriental's legendary service, Michelin-starred cuisine and award-winning spas in the world's most sought-after locations, all wrapped into one elegant package. Mandarin Oriental Gift Cards are perfect for such special occasions as weddings, birthdays and anniversaries.
$hpCopy.littleFansText: MiniMO the Panda–inspired bedding and loungewear for our younger Mandarin Oriental Fans.
$hpCopy.quote: ‘One of the great luxuries in life is sleep. With small children at home, I rarely get enough of it. Mandarin Oriental Hyde Park, London has beds that you can sleep in for days.’
$hpCopy.quote_2: ‛I am a very simple guy. I like a lovely solid bed, that’s not too soft. I like good service. I like a certain amount of peace and quiet. Once these are in place (…) then I’m content. Certain hotels get it, certain don’t. Mandarin Oriental hotels get it every time.’
$hpCopy.quote_3: ‛What I sometimes like to do is to do a staycation. Go to the spa, order room service (...) have everything in one place. And one of the most luxurious things is to go and stay at Mandarin Oriental.’
$hpCopy.quote_4: ‛My idea of a luxury in a hotel is a great bathroom. That’s where I learn all my lines. And where I wash off the character. That’s really important to me. And great bedsheets.’
$hpCopy.seoCopy: Bring home Mandarin Oriental's signature elegance with Shop M.O. Whether laying the foundation for a restful sleep with our plush beds, linens and pillows or indulging in our rich bath essentials, bathrobes and slippers, pure luxury awaits you. And don't forget to treat yourself or a loved one to exclusive gifts and unique finds from Mandarin Oriental hotel properties around the world.
$hpCopy.signatureText: For those with discerning taste, an assortment of chic gifts and exclusive accessories from our hotels around the world.

$terms.ELITEFANS15: Enjoy 20% off shopmo.com. This offer is exclusively reserved for Fans of M.O. Elite members. Offer does not apply to taxes, shipping fees, or previous purchases, and may not be combined with any other offer. Offer valid until December 31, 2021 and while stocks last. Other restrictions may apply.
$terms.EMPLOYEES15: Enjoy 15% off shopmo.com. This offer is exclusively reserved for Mandarin Oriental colleagues. Offer does not apply to taxes, shipping fees, or previous purchases, and may not be combined with any other offer. Offer valid while supplies last. Other restrictions may apply.
$terms.FANS10: Enjoy 20% off shopmo.com. This offer is exclusively reserved for Fans of M.O. members. Offer does not apply to taxes, shipping fees, or previous purchases, and may not be combined with any other offer. Offer valid until December 31, 2021 and while stocks last. Other restrictions may apply.
$terms.HOLIDAY15: Enjoy 15% off shopmo.com. Offer does not apply to taxes, shipping fees, or previous purchases, and may not be combined with any other offer. Offer valid through November 29, 2021 and while supplies last. Other restrictions may apply.
$terms.OWNERS20: Enjoy 20% off shopmo.com. This offer is exclusively reserved for Residence Owners. Offer does not apply to taxes, shipping fees, or previous purchases, and may not be combined with any other offer. Offer valid while supplies last. Other restrictions may apply.
$terms.STAYONEDEGREE: Enjoy 20% off shopmo.com. This offer is exclusively reserved for Stay One Degree members. Offer does not apply to taxes, shipping fees, or previous purchases, and may not be combined with any other offer. Offer valid while supplies last. Other restrictions may apply.

$topBanner.ELITEFANS15: Fans of M.O. Elite Members enjoy a limited time offer of 20% off all Shop M.O. products.
$topBanner.EMPLOYEES15: Mandarin Oriental colleagues enjoy an exclusive 15% discount on all Shop M.O. products.
$topBanner.FANS10: Fans of M.O. Members enjoy a limited time offer of 20% off all Shop M.O. products.
$topBanner.HOLIDAY15: 15% off all Shop M.O. products ends November 29th at midnight.
$topBanner.OWNERS20: Residence Owners enjoy an exclusive 20% discount on all Shop M.O. products.
$topBanner.STAYONEDEGREE: Stay One Degree members enjoy a limited time offer of 20% off all Shop M.O. products.

$local.copyright: © {year} Mandarin Oriental and Hotels At Home, Inc. All Right Reserved.
$local.headerTagline: Bring home a touch of luxury
$local.mohgSubscriptionTerms_1: MOHG will use your personal data to contact you via electronic messages to inform you of news and promotions relating to accommodation and travel-related products and services associated with MOHG (e.g. hotels, residences, travel, events, concierge services, spa, food & beverage) and anonymise your personal data for analytics and targeted marketing activities. By ticking this box, you consent to such use.
$local.mohgSubscriptionTerms_2: To see how MOHG uses your personal information (including the collection, retention and usage of your name, contact details, other personal information, transaction data and demographics), please visit mandarinoriental.com/privacy-policy. For the purposes of providing the services requested by you, MOHG will share your personal information with MOHG’s global network of companies, and MOHG’s service providers that assist MOHG with administering your personal information, which are located both within and outside the EU/EEA. You have the right to request a copy or portability of and/or the correction, objection to processing and/or deletion of your personal information held by MOHG at any time by contacting MOHG at data-protection@mohg.com.
$local.subscribeParagraph: Be the first to know about limited edition collaborations and more.
$local.subscriptionSuccess: Thank you for signing up to receive emails from Shop M.O.
